ETYMOLOGY: Shortened form of 'goodbye', which originated as a contraction of the phrase 'God be with ye'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word or phrase used to express a sudden or strong feeling, or to command or request, often standing alone.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A common informal contraction of 'goodbye', used to express farewell upon parting.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 再见；告别（“goodbye”的缩略形式，常用于非正式场合）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I need to leave for my appointment now, bye!

MEANINGS.PATTERN: [sb] get a bye | [sth] is a bye
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: In a competition, the status of a player or team that automatically advances to the next round without having to compete in the current round.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 轮空（体育比赛中，因抽签或其他原因自动晋级下一轮，不需参加当前轮次的比赛）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Since there was an odd number of participants, the top seed received a bye in the opening round.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 由于参赛人数是单数，头号种子在首轮比赛中获得了轮空。
